name: Catch them eggs!
description:
Eggs are falling from the sky! Use your hands (placing yourself in front of the camera) to catch and save as many as you can. Don't let them reach the ground!!!

Developed as a Human Computer Interaction project. Check the Source Code if you're interested.

NOTE: The game will take some seconds to setup the hand-detection side of things, after witch you'll be free to play.

Thanks for playing,

Andrea Masciulli and Alessandro Pegoraro
